00046 ssize_t FileUtils::read(int fd, void *vptr, size_t n) {
00047   size_t nleft;
00048   ssize_t nread;
00049   char *ptr;
00050 
00051   ptr = (char *)vptr;
00052   nleft = n;
00053   while (nleft > 0) {
00054     if ( (nread = ::read(fd, ptr, nleft)) < 0) {
00055       if (errno == EINTR)
00056         nread = 0;/* and call read() again */
00057       else if (errno == EAGAIN)
00058         break;
00059       else
00060         return -1;
00061     } else if (nread == 0)
00062       break;/* EOF */
00063 
00064     nleft -= nread;
00065     ptr   += nread;
00066   }
00067   return n - nleft;
00068 }

00072 ssize_t FileUtils::pread(int fd, void *vptr, size_t n, off_t offset) {
00073   size_t nleft;
00074   ssize_t nread;
00075   char *ptr;
00076 
00077   ptr = (char *)vptr;
00078   nleft = n;
00079   while (nleft > 0) {
00080     if ( (nread = ::pread(fd, ptr, nleft, offset)) < 0) {
00081       if (errno == EINTR)
00082         nread = 0;/* and call read() again */
00083       else if (errno == EAGAIN)
00084         break;
00085       else
00086         return -1;
00087     } else if (nread == 0)
00088       break;/* EOF */
00089 
00090     nleft -= nread;
00091     ptr   += nread;
00092     offset += nread;
00093   }
00094   return n - nleft;
00095 }

00099 ssize_t FileUtils::write(int fd, const void *vptr, size_t n) {
00100   size_t nleft;
00101   ssize_t nwritten;
00102   const char *ptr;
00103 
00104   ptr = (const char *)vptr;
00105   nleft = n;
00106   while (nleft > 0) {
00107     if ((nwritten = ::write(fd, ptr, nleft)) <= 0) {
00108       if (errno == EINTR)
00109         nwritten = 0; /* and call write() again */
00110       if (errno == EAGAIN)
00111         break;
00112       else
00113         return -1; /* error */
00114     }
00115 
00116     nleft -= nwritten;
00117     ptr   += nwritten;
00118   }
00119   return n - nleft;
00120 }

00122 ssize_t FileUtils::writev(int fd, const struct iovec *vector, int count) {
00123   ssize_t nwritten;
00124   while ((nwritten = ::writev(fd, vector, count)) <= 0) {
00125     if (errno == EINTR)
00126       nwritten = 0; /* and call write() again */
00127     if (errno == EAGAIN) {
00128       nwritten = 0;
00129       break;
00130     }
00131     else
00132       return -1; /* error */
00133   }
00134   return nwritten;
00135 }

00138 ssize_t FileUtils::sendto(int fd, const void *vptr, size_t n, const struct sockaddr *to, socklen_t tolen) {
00139   size_t nleft;
00140   ssize_t nsent;
00141   const char *ptr;
00142 
00143   ptr = (const char *)vptr;
00144   nleft = n;
00145   while (nleft > 0) {
00146     if ((nsent = ::sendto(fd, ptr, nleft, 0, to, tolen)) <= 0) {
00147       if (errno == EINTR)
00148         nsent = 0; /* and call sendto() again */
00149       if (errno == EAGAIN || errno == ENOBUFS)
00150         break;
00151       else
00152         return -1; /* error */
00153     }
00154 
00155     nleft -= nsent;
00156     ptr   += nsent;
00157   }
00158   return n - nleft;
00159 }

00161 ssize_t FileUtils::recvfrom(int fd, void *vptr, size_t n, struct sockaddr *from, socklen_t *fromlen) {
00162   ssize_t nread;
00163   while (true) {
00164     if ( (nread = ::recvfrom(fd, vptr, n, 0, from, fromlen)) < 0) {
00165       if (errno != EINTR)
00166         break;
00167     }
00168     else
00169       break;
00170   }
00171   return nread;
00172 }

00175 /* flags are file status flags to turn on */
00176 void FileUtils::set_flags(int fd, int flags) {
00177   int val;
00178 
00179   if ( (val = fcntl(fd, F_GETFL, 0)) < 0)
00180     cerr << "fcnt(F_GETFL) failed : " << strerror(errno) << endl;
00181 
00182   val |= flags;
00183 
00184   if (fcntl(fd, F_SETFL, val) < 0)
00185     cerr << "fcnt(F_SETFL) failed : " << strerror(errno) << endl;
00186 }

00192 char *FileUtils::file_to_buffer(const std::string &fname, off_t *lenp) {
00193   struct stat statbuf;
00194   int fd;
00195 
00196   *lenp = 0;
00197 
00198   if ((fd = open(fname.c_str(), O_RDONLY)) < 0) {
00199     HT_ERRORF("open(\"%s\") failure - %s", fname.c_str(),  strerror(errno));
00200     return 0;
00201   }
00202 
00203   if (fstat(fd, &statbuf) < 0) {
00204     HT_ERRORF("fstat(\"%s\") failure - %s", fname.c_str(),  strerror(errno));
00205     return 0;
00206   }
00207 
00208   *lenp = statbuf.st_size;
00209 
00210   char *rbuf = new char [ *lenp + 1 ];
00211 
00212   ssize_t nread = FileUtils::read(fd, rbuf, *lenp);
00213 
00214   if (nread == (ssize_t)-1) {
00215     HT_ERRORF("read(\"%s\") failure - %s", fname.c_str(),  strerror(errno));
00216     delete [] rbuf;
00217     *lenp = 0;
00218     return 0;
00219   }
00220 
00221   if (nread < *lenp) {
00222     HT_WARNF("short read (%d of %d bytes)", nread, *lenp);
00223     *lenp = nread;
00224   }
00225 
00226   rbuf[nread] = 0;
00227 
00228   return rbuf;
00229 }

00232 bool FileUtils::mkdirs(const std::string &dirname) {
00233   struct stat statbuf;
00234   boost::shared_array<char> tmpDirPtr(new char [ dirname.length() + 1 ]);
00235   char *tmpDir = tmpDirPtr.get();
00236   char *ptr = tmpDir+1;
00237 
00238   strcpy(tmpDir, dirname.c_str());
00239 
00240   while ((ptr = strchr(ptr, '/')) != 0) {
00241     *ptr = 0;
00242     if (stat(tmpDir, &statbuf) != 0) {
00243       if (errno == ENOENT) {
00244         if (mkdir(tmpDir, 0755) != 0) {
00245           HT_ERRORF("Problem creating directory '%s' - %s", tmpDir, strerror(errno));
00246           return false;
00247         }
00248       }
00249       else {
00250         HT_ERRORF("Problem stat'ing directory '%s' - %s", tmpDir, strerror(errno));
00251         return false;
00252       }
00253     }
00254     *ptr++ = '/';
00255   }
00256 
00257   if (stat(tmpDir, &statbuf) != 0) {
00258     if (errno == ENOENT) {
00259       if (mkdir(tmpDir, 0755) != 0) {
00260         HT_ERRORF("Problem creating directory '%s' - %s", tmpDir, strerror(errno));
00261         return false;
00262       }
00263     }
00264     else {
00265       HT_ERRORF("Problem stat'ing directory '%s' - %s", tmpDir, strerror(errno));
00266       return false;
00267     }
00268   }
00269 
00270   return true;
00271 }

00274 bool FileUtils::exists(const std::string &fname) {
00275   struct stat statbuf;
00276   if (stat(fname.c_str(), &statbuf) != 0)
00277     return false;
00278   return true;
00279 }

00281 uint64_t FileUtils::size(const std::string &fname) {
00282   struct stat statbuf;
00283   if (stat(fname.c_str(), &statbuf) != 0)
00284     return 0;
00285   return statbuf.st_size;
00286

00290 off_t FileUtils::length(const std::string &fname) {
00291   struct stat statbuf;
00292   if (stat(fname.c_str(), &statbuf) != 0)
00293     return (off_t)-1;
00294   return statbuf.st_size;
00295 }

00298 int FileUtils::getxattr(const std::string &path, const std::string &name, void *value, size_t size) {
00299   std::string canonicalName = (std::string)"user." + name;
00300 #if defined(__linux__)
00301   return ::getxattr(path.c_str(), canonicalName.c_str(), value, size);
00302 #elif defined(__APPLE__)
00303   return ::getxattr(path.c_str(), canonicalName.c_str(), value, size, 0, 0);
00304 #else
00305   ImplementMe;
00306 #endif
00307 }

00369 void FileUtils::add_trailing_slash(std::string &path) {
00370   if (path.find('/', path.length()-1) == string::npos)
00371     path += "/";
00372 }

00375 bool FileUtils::expand_tilde(std::string &fname) {
00376   struct passwd pbuf;
00377   struct passwd *prbuf;
00378   char buf[256];
00379 
00380   if (fname[0] != '~')
00381     return false;
00382 
00383   if (fname[1] == '/') {
00384     if (getpwuid_r( getuid() , &pbuf, buf, 256, &prbuf ) != 0 || prbuf == 0)
00385       return false;
00386     fname = (std::string)pbuf.pw_dir + fname.substr(1);
00387   }
00388   else {
00389     std::string name;
00390     size_t first_slash = fname.find_first_of('/');
00391 
00392     if (first_slash == string::npos)
00393       name = fname.substr(1);
00394     else
00395       name = fname.substr(1, first_slash-1);
00396 
00397     if (getpwnam_r( name.c_str() , &pbuf, buf, 256, &prbuf ) != 0 || prbuf == 0)
00398       return false;
00399 
00400     if (first_slash == string::npos)
00401       fname = pbuf.pw_dir;
00402     else
00403       fname = (std::string)pbuf.pw_dir + fname.substr(first_slash);
00404   }
00405 
00406   return true;
00407 }
